title: Motivating the ones we love & the dirt on GMO's
description:
Our partners, our parents, our kids, our sisters, our brothers, our friends, all the people we love. How on earth do we motivate them to a healthier, happier way of living?  And can we? GMO's!  We cannot ignore.  So Jillian helps us figure out how to deal with them. Jillian takes caller questions on fitness, nutrition, inspiration and overall wellness.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
